short_description: porky pete’s is a restaurant based in essex, connecticut, united states.
long_description: porky pete's offers great authentic southern bar-b-que on the connecticut shoreline. you'll be surprised when you eat our bbq, it's like being transported down south. our bbq smoked pork sandwich meat is a special process that we've adapted specifically for our pork bbq sandwiches. in the small, relatively modern kitchen…which operates out of porky petes in essex, ct… served period food, planned the menu and donated her services…. located in essex, ct • pulled pork, beef brisket, bbq chicken & more. let us cater your corporate business or personal party- or pick up a delicious takeout dinner tonight.
